short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Put gifs in your Github issues and pull requests without leaving the textarea

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extends the markdown image syntax by allowing you to search for gifs right from Github textareas. Use the syntax ![](gif: <search term>) to search Giphy for gifs.

Open source at: https://github.com/kevinwuhoo/gitphy.
